summary: Steve and Jared are in his car, finishing up their prior conversation about them moving on from their past relationships.  Steve finally decides to confide in Jared.  Her name isn't Steve.  Steve was a prior employee of the Lone Star.  she tells Jared how she sees the name as a way to hide, to keep her true identity hidden away.  a way to keep distance from others.  Jared listens.  Steve, finally looks up...says...my name is Jennifer.  she smiles, jared smiles back.  Jennifer reaches out and touches Jared's hand.  he responds an grabs it.  they share a silence as they sit in the car, punk rock music quietly playing in the background.
